t: Amazon.com: Glutenfreeda Gluten Free Instant Oatmeal, Berry Medley, 8-packet Box, 8 Pack : Industrial & Scientific
s: I also want to extend a huge "thank you" to Glutenfreeda for making such delicious products for those of us who must restrict to a gluten-free diet. You truly are a blessing to me!! ... Love the product. Seller is unethical. Purchased numerous times before. Purchased October 2018. Product Best by Date January 2018. ... I was truly surprised, but I really enjoyed this. The taste was great and I didn't have to worry about glysophate as some Quaker brands ...

t: Yummy, I compare this brand with Glutenfreeda!
s: I made both brands using the same method, milk + 30 second intervals in the microwave. That always results in a creamier instant oatmeal for me. GlutenFreeda: Apple Cinnamon Right away I noticed Freedas packet was much heavier and bulkier than BOM, although Freeda has 2g less oatmeal per pack.

t: Amazon.com: Glutenfreeda Oatmeal, Variety Pack 11.02 oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Glutenfreeda oatmeal, variety pack is made with only the purest ingredients and comes with three gluten-free flavors: (2) maple raisin with flax, (3) brown sugar with flax and (3) apple cinnamon with flax. This whole grain oatmeal is low fat, low sodium, kosher and Non-GMO.
